title: Voltskiya

Github-GameMechanics.comment: Repo for all major game mechanics

Github-CustomMobs.comment: Repo for all added custom mobs

Github-Utilities.comment: Repo for common utilities specific to Voltskiya

Github-Decay.comment: Decay and regeneration of the map was big enough to be it's own repo

summary: Developed Minecraft Plugins to create a custom survival experience
comments: I really grew as a programmer with this project more than any other to date.
Working to develop for an ever-changing environment taught me the importance of writing code that didn't just get the job done for today, but also for the next project
